docs.title: MKDocs 命令集
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: 目錄結構
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Development Plan of OCR Service Project
Objectives
docs.text: To develop an OCR API Services specially for Traditional Chinese Characters Recognition.

docs.title: Why We need an OCR Specially for Traditional Chinese Characters
Roadmap
docs.text:
graph TD
    A(Pahse 1 - OCR Service API) --> A1(Phase 2 - OCR Accuracy Improvement)
    A1 --> A2(Phase 4 - OCR Model Reconstruction)
    A2 --|OCR Accuracy Improved|-->A

docs.title: Timeline
docs.text:
timeline
    title History of Social Media Platform
    2025/Q1 : Phase 1 - OCR API Service
            : Phase 2 - OCR Accuracy Improvement

docs.title: Phase 1 - OCR Service API
docs.text:
• To build a OCR microservice
  • Version v. 0.1
  • Features
    • To upload an image file
    • To recognize the image content to text

docs.title: Phase 2 - OCR Accuracy Improvement
docs.text:
• To improve ocr Service for Traditional Chinese character recognition
  • Version: v. 0.2
  • Features
  • Tech Stacks
    • Machine Learning - Pytorch
